# Python Wordpress API

[![Pypi][pypi-image]][pypi-url]
[![Pyup][pyup-image]][pyup-url]


Simple wrapper around the Wordpress REST API


* Free software: MIT licensea

* Will soon work on some documentation

## Tests

make test
